verbs.description: [ARG0: British Prime Minister Theresa May] [V: told] [ARG2: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: that U.S. tariffs imposed on European Union steel and aluminium imports were " unjustified and deeply disappointing] . "

British Prime Minister Theresa May told President Donald Trump on Monday that [ARG1: U.S. tariffs] [V: imposed] [ARG2: on European Union steel and aluminium imports] were " unjustified and deeply disappointing . "
